
## Load data

```{r}
load('data/NIH_survey.Rdata')
```


## Demographics

```{r, include=FALSE}
temp <- wide %>% select(gender, age, education, employment, marital, ethnicity, hispanic, diagnosis_subtype, hospitalization, PAD, banked, savings, trust_clinician, trust_carepartner, trust_bank)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
dfSummary(temp, varnumbers=FALSE, na.col=FALSE, graph.col=FALSE, max.distinct.values=22, headings=FALSE)
```
